comments.author: @mazda_miata_
comments.text: At I think 2:50, you said you've been getting about 70 subs per day. Now you're at 15 thousand, so let's say you maybe get 85 subs per day (I might be wrong, I'm not Albert Einstein....or am I?). So I found that technically in 365 days, or in 1 year, so December 30, 2016, you'll have about 46,025 subscribers. I did 365 days times 85 subscribers. Of course you'll have more than that, but you'll AT LEAST have that many. And if you don't for some weird crazy reason, I will let my cat take a dump on my face (somehow). Congratulations MrBeast, and here's to another year of success for your channel. :D
